To remember what was denied is also a form of witness.
This archive will continue to grow â€” in presence, in absence, and in demand for coherence.
Because if no record exists, then refusal must be what remains.

ğŸ’¬ Want to understand the method behind this archive? Read the About page

Scope of Archive
All documents and correspondence archived here relate to official, public business with government or enforcement agencies.
Communications with NGOs, media, or other non-governmental actors are not included on this site.
Personal contact details (such as private phone numbers or non-official emails) have been redacted where applicable.
Citation or reuse of these materials should acknowledge this archive as the source and respect the context of their publication.
